catapult.name: Catapult
catapult.description: Hurls stones at enemy buildings. Slow but devastating.

ballista.name: Ballista
ballista.description: Massive crossbow. Punishes slow or large targets.

bakery.name: Bakery
bakery.description: Bakes bread from grain, providing more nutritious food than raw crops.

barracks.name: Barracks
barracks.description: Trains and houses basic infantry units.

carpentry_workshop.name: Carpentry Workshop
carpentry_workshop.description: Turns wood into planks for better constructions.

farm.name: Farm
farm.description: Grows wheat. Must be placed on fertile soil.

hunting_lodge.name: Hunting Lodge
hunting_lodge.description: Hunts animals for food. Requires pasture.

lumberjack_hut.name: Lumberjack Hut
lumberjack_hut.description: Chops trees for wood. Must be placed on forest.

mine.name: Mine
mine.description: Extracts stone, iron ore, or gold ore from deposits.

smelter.name: Smelter
smelter.description: Smelts ore into metal. Also produces concrete.

town_hall.name: Town Hall
town_hall.description: Your starting base. Produces basic resources and units.

blast_furnace.name: Blast Furnace
blast_furnace.description: Produces steel from iron and fuel. Essential for advanced industry.

engineering_workshop.name: Engineering Workshop
engineering_workshop.description: Builds and deploys siege weapons like catapults and ballistas.

factory.name: Factory
factory.description: Mass production facility. Replaces several basic buildings with higher efficiency.

pasture.name: Pasture
pasture.description: A grassy plain teeming with deer and wild game. A perfect spot for hunters to gather food and hides.

lake.name: Lake
lake.description: A life-giving source of fresh water and home to schools of fish. Ideal for building a fishing hut.

forest.name: Forest
forest.description: A dense grove of ancient trees, ready to be harvested for construction and fuel.

iron_deposit.name: Iron deposit
iron_deposit.description: A rocky outcrop rich in iron ore. Mine it to forge weapons and tools.

gold_deposit.name: Gold deposit
gold_deposit.description: A rare vein of glittering gold. The key to wealth and prosperity for your settlement.
